summary: A tutorial on building a custom RAG agent using LangGraph, covering document processing, indexing, and agentic RAG system implementation.

structure.path: agentic-rag > Build a custom RAG agent with LangGraph
structure.title: Build a custom RAG agent with LangGraph
structure.summary: A tutorial on building a custom RAG agent using LangGraph, covering document processing, indexing, and agentic RAG system implementation.

nodes.path: agentic-rag > Build a custom RAG agent with LangGraph > Overview
nodes.title: Overview
nodes.summary: A tutorial on building a custom retrieval agent using LangGraph, covering document processing, indexing, and agentic RAG system implementation.

nodes.path: agentic-rag > Build a custom RAG agent with LangGraph > Overview > Concepts
nodes.title: Concepts
nodes.summary: Introduction to key concepts for building a custom RAG agent with LangGraph, covering retrieval components and the LangGraph Graph API.

nodes.path: agentic-rag > Build a custom RAG agent with LangGraph > Setup
nodes.title: Setup
nodes.summary: Install required packages and set up API keys for building a custom RAG agent with LangGraph.

nodes.path: agentic-rag > Build a custom RAG agent with LangGraph > 1. Preprocess documents
nodes.title: 1. Preprocess documents
nodes.summary: Demonstrates fetching blog posts using WebBaseLoader and splitting them into chunks with RecursiveCharacterTextSplitter for RAG preprocessing.

nodes.path: agentic-rag > Build a custom RAG agent with LangGraph > 2. Create a retriever tool
nodes.title: 2. Create a retriever tool
nodes.summary: Demonstrates creating a semantic search retriever tool using an in-memory vector store and OpenAI embeddings, and testing it with a query.

nodes.path: agentic-rag > Build a custom RAG agent with LangGraph > 3. Generate query
nodes.title: 3. Generate query
nodes.summary: Builds a LangGraph node that uses an LLM to decide between retrieving information or responding directly based on input messages.

nodes.path: agentic-rag > Build a custom RAG agent with LangGraph > 4. Grade documents
nodes.title: 4. Grade documents
nodes.summary: Implements a conditional edge in LangGraph to grade document relevance using a structured LLM, routing to answer generation or question rewriting.

nodes.path: agentic-rag > Build a custom RAG agent with LangGraph > 5. Rewrite question
nodes.title: 5. Rewrite question
nodes.summary: Defines a function to rewrite user questions for better retrieval by analyzing semantic intent and generating improved queries.

nodes.path: agentic-rag > Build a custom RAG agent with LangGraph > 6. Generate an answer
nodes.title: 6. Generate an answer
nodes.summary: This section details the implementation of a `generate_answer` node in a LangGraph-based RAG agent. It includes the prompt template and function for generating a final answer using retrieved context, and provides a test example with output.

nodes.path: agentic-rag > Build a custom RAG agent with LangGraph > 7. Assemble the graph
nodes.title: 7. Assemble the graph
nodes.summary: Assembles a LangGraph workflow for a RAG agent, detailing node connections, conditional routing, and graph compilation.

nodes.path: agentic-rag > Build a custom RAG agent with LangGraph > 8. Run the agentic RAG
nodes.title: 8. Run the agentic RAG
nodes.summary: Demonstrates running a LangGraph agentic RAG system with a query about reward hacking, showing the step-by-step node outputs and final answer.
